actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the redistribution of unused quota numbers.

summary.text: States that quota visa numbers not issued under the Immigration and Nationality Act during fiscal year 1977, shall be transferred to an immigration pool to be issued to specified preference classes of immigrants and to others who are otherwise admissible but unable to obtain prompt issuance of a preference visa solely because of the oversubscription of visas.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the redistribution of unused quota numbers.
